Key Match Events: Dawid Malan scored 140 runs off 107 balls
Taskin Ahmed was bowled by Sam Curran
Mehidy Hasan Miraz was bowled by Reece Topley

Shoriful Islam was bowled by Mark Wood

Post-Match Reflections: Dawid Malan was awarded Player of the Match

Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala
England won the match by 137 runs
